header_logo: Ministry of Justice of the Republic of Uzbekistan
hero_text: Consistent implementation of a unified state policy in the field of lawmaking and law enforcement practice
subject: Subject
about-us_text: At the initiative of the Head of State, Shavkat Mirziyoyev, the justice bodies have been transformed into a more people-oriented structure responsible for addressing legal issues of citizens directly on the ground, in the mahallas (neighborhoods). First, the justice bodies will take practical measures to identify and analyze legal problems that arise in the daily lives of the population, as well as develop legislative projects aimed at resolving them.
